data.text: @PhillyD watching your video and the Facebook part got a note and I ranted to my wife for a bit about how FB has drained me and how you are right about how the more you know about a person the more you don’t like. so we got rid of the FB app on our phones and are taking a break from it

@M_S_J @PhillyD Think you missed the point from the previous pds, where he said he waits for Trump to tweet before he invests, and explained why. Now he was surprised that what he thought would happen didnt actually happen.
@PhillyD I permanently deleted Facebook at the beginning of the year, not just the app. I don't miss it one bit! I really only use Twitter now.
@PhillyD I love how things go to a "Logan paul v. Ksi" scenario. Not even sarcastic, it's just funny.

@PhillyD don't use fb like most people do. I have under 40 friends, I only like a handful of pages, and I don't use any of their bullshit apps, and I don't use them to log into anything. Fb is completely contained. Also, fun fact, I refuse to watch YouTube on mobile. 100% desktop here.

@PhillyD Man I'm late on this one. I keep fb on my phone. However, it has almost no correct information, and almost every single privacy setting is set to "only me." On desktop fb doesn't look like fb because I've altered it so much with custom CSS to remove the dumb shit. However, I
@jisheppard @PhillyD PhillyD has kinda fallen off that's why. Poppy Harlow is a much more reputable news source
@PhillyD I'll take "Just another Wednesday in America" for $500, Alex.
@PhillyD Will you do a story on the man killed in Afghanistan. It is know where in the news and I think he needs to be remember.
@PhillyD shout out to the @messengergame shout out at 5:50 ✌️😎✌️ https://t.co/rmqbNT9PO7
@ProgressiveJon1 @PhillyD https://t.co/LNab3OyESM
@PhillyD ... Now I am connected to NordVPN and they can't troll me at Microsoft.

@PhillyD Playerunknown's Battlegrounds is broken' or Microsoft is trolling me, Don't believe me.I get at least 10 hit markers in less then 3 seconds and then the guy turns around,but isn't facing me, and gets a kill on me in two shots.Last 30 seconds of my cast... https://t.co/O2gf8XpSGg
@PhillyD My person doesn't really go on facebook anymore cause he says ppl talk shit and share to much they should keep to themselves!
@FightTheCensors @PhillyD Would you prefer I spread rumor on second/third hand opinions or first hand truth?
@SexualSocialist @PhillyD Had the same response to that clip.

@PhillyD I wanted to punch Alex Jones when he touched Rubio. Patting someone on the back and calling them buddy (or whatever he said) is next level douchebaggary. Also why did he look slightly homeless.
@PhillyD You said "he's just digging a deep hole" about the Elon Musk story, he has a boring company, of course hes digging a hole 🤣
@PhillyD can't find it in my subscription box though.

@PhillyD There are people on the internet and especially  YouTube that I can't give an honest opinion on. This would require me to sit through a complete video. Alex Jones is one of those people. I'm hit with much negative energy I have turn it off. Five minutes is a nearly impossible.
@PhillyD Love watching musk bury himself.

@ProgressiveJon1 @PhillyD Sucking up to YouTube? You do realize how often he goes after them, he had to split his show up because of it. Also, curious why you liked your own tweet? https://t.co/Wvr0dVMhI4
